channel.title: Perl Files
channel.description:
When I run my perl file, it quickly shows the screen and exits. Can someone tell me why it does this and maybe how to fix it? Am I missing some type of end code?
Nevermind someone on a different forums helped me fix, if anyone else is having this problem, add this code to the top of your perl program:
[code]END{ sleep 1e9; }[/code]
